titlestmt.titleproper: Tennent College of Christian Education Student Association records 1936-1937
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Tennent College of Christian Education Student Association records

bioghist.p: The Tennent College of Christian Education was opened in Philadelphia in 1907 to train women for lay leadership roles in the church. In 1936-1937 the President of the College was Sheila Jones and the secretary was Elizabeth Suiter.

scopecontent.p: Minutes of the Tennent College of Christian Education Student Association, Sept. 1936-May 6, 1937.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
